level.text: The Mayor shall issue rules to implement the provisions of these regulations within 90 days of the effective date of the Police Regulations of the District of Columbia/Video Arcades Mechanical Amusement Machines Regulations Amendment Act of 1984.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: D.C. Act 5-129, ยง 8(a) published at 31 DCR 2331, 2339 (May 18, 1984).
